name: The Copperport Casefiles: Slay Bells
description:
After working late into the night, retail worker Katie Munro finally closes shop and heads home to enjoy what's left of her Christmas eve.

It's not long before she has been locked in the Mall for the night, and she is not alone.

This game represents the end result of a challenge to see how much I could get built in just 20 days. As such the end result will be buggy and rough around the edges.

Now that the challenge has ended, over the next weeks I will continue to polish this project by:

Improving and fine tuning the AI behavior.

General bug fixes.

Further optimize the game.

Polish the art work and add additional details.

Your help would be greatly appreciated with, please share with me any thoughts you have on improving this project or bugs that you have identified on in the comments.
